example.text: At the very least, TikTok’s censorship of anti-CCP content draws suspicions of the app’s ties to the CCP. Add this to the list of reasons why TikTok and ByteDance cannot be trusted. [[url]]

I'm grateful the end of Title 42 was delayed last week, preventing a greater influx of migrants at our border that is already under stress. I'm hopeful for bipartisan support in this area to secure our border and increase public safety.
I am grateful South Dakota was chosen to be home of the Raider. I was proud to vote in support of the NDAA, a vote that supports our nation's military, something we should all agree on.
